title: Take any passive and change it
body:
.... http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/7b3ac3ab41a35031f925380180866d7f.jpg
I want this so bad (⊙︿⊙)

.. Anyhow point of this thread
If you could change a SINGLE passive ingame what would you do to it?

You can buff or nerf said passive or completely alter it
Example being on death anivia turns into an egg with full hp and after ( w/e the time is ) she revives as the cryophoenix
but in our Version on death anivia's corpse shatters into thousands of needle like shards that pierce all nearby enemies drastically slowing movement for 4.5 secs and puts anivia into egg form for 3.5 secs
Passive recharges after 1 minute 20 secs

replies.body: {{champion:157}} Way of the Wanderer {{champion:238}} Contempt for the Weak - Both removed and replaced with Instant ban upon selection.

{{champion:31}}: Pfhht, Ahri mains.

{{champion:111}}: I know, right?

As a Cho'gath main, I could never figure out why people don't like Zed.

He always struck me as kinda weak. You just eat him when he ults you, duh. can't every champ do that?

Gragas just body slams him under his turret when he does that. 

God I tilted that Zed so hard.

Sion:  base movement speed does not decay when in passive. 

I don't care how good that speed boost, it is hilariously frustrating how awkward it is to see Sion MAYBE punch someone and then be out of their reach by just the smallest amount for the rest of the duration. 

Half the time it doesn't look like they're running from fear. It's like they're screaming "Chase me!" Like a little kid while Sion is an out of shape father losing his breath. 

Yes Sion is old, but he's a freaking war machine!!!
